mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, TARGET_ID, TYPE, ACCOUNT, USE_MONEY, NO_USE_MONEY, DRAW_MONEY, NO_DRAW_MONEY, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, PLATFORM, REMARK
mapper.insert:
insert into t_cur_out (ID, USER_ID, TARGET_ID, TYPE, ACCOUNT, USE_MONEY, NO_USE_MONEY, DRAW_MONEY, NO_DRAW_MONEY, ADDUSER, ADDTIME, ADDIP, PLATFORM, REMARK ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{noUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{drawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{noDrawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

mapper.update:
update t_cur_out
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USE_MONEY = #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NO_USE_MONEY = #{noUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DRAW_MONEY = #{drawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NO_DRAW_MONEY = #{noDrawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},

ADDIP = #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_cur_out set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USE_MONEY = #{useMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NO_USE_MONEY = #{noUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DRAW_MONEY = #{drawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NO_DRAW_MONEY = #{noDrawMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDIP = #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM t_cur_out WHERE TYPE = 0 AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT FROM t_cur_out WHERE TYPE = #{type} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND ACCOUNT = #{account} order by id desc limit 1
